topic.title: Hey /zero/, exist a moderator here?
topic.body: Any fiscalization to ban isis propaganda, child porn and all of that shit? Here is a awesome place, so, keep this place free of this retarded guys is a good idea.

topic.title: Send/receive email to a external mail plataform using ZeroMail.
topic.body: Hey guys, well, it's possible use the zeromail to send emails to the hotmail, for example? Exist any site with tutorial to show me how to make that?

2_1DSoqCXNkqv7yJNXiF6YoaeK2bW8BFt2gh.body:
> [0ivy](#comment_1_1Q3wv52h6RSubdYu5aoxZzfkFHmEx9wtfM): I'm pretty sure zeromail isn't even email (technically)you can do it if you make a bot to do it for you though, but that's about it

Thx dude, you solved my doubt.

1_18jipjDsfAxAuq4ixbi2w24xJrYVfTYFPn.body:
> [cantalupo](#comment_1_1GCBbTCjGZsJL7BqdRx13gEbueEnY6gsMm): Joao Pessoa - Brasil

Hue é nóis!
